p: Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228; a representative of Gram positive, Escherichia coli ATCC 29425; a representative of Gram negative and Candida glabrata ATCC 22553; fungi, were obtained from the Microbial Culture Collection Center of Medicine School at The University of Jordan, Jordan. Microorganisms were grown in nutrient broth medium and incubated, with shaking, at 37 °C and at 33 °C, for bacteria and candida respectively.
